/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering skyline. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades showcasing a blend of traditional and modern architectural styles. 

Vehicles of various types, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The street is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. 

The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green, gray, and brown, reflecting the interplay of nature and architecture in the cityscape.
